param.name: Release
param.spec: text description='Release Name' label='Release' validationMode='any' display='prompt'

parameters.param:
[[ -d /var/data/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/data/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/%Release%
for file in "stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc" do rm $file done
wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc
[[ -f stage1.spec ]] || wget -O stage1.spec https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/tree/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec
if [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(sha512sum stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2) stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else echo "Clobbering stagnant stage" rm stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 FETCH_STAGE=1 fi
if [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2) portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else FETCH_PORTAGE=1 echo "Clobbering stagnant snapshot" fi
(( FETCH_STAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 (( FETCH_PORTAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2
sudo catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"

[[ -d /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 wget -O portage-latest.tar.bz2 http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2 wget https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/tree/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec #sudo catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"
